content.description: Diminutive but fun layback corner. Fits in well with the rest of the mini-routes in this zone.
content.protection: Gear to 3", 2 bolt anchor. Walk off to the right.
content.location: Obvious left-facing corner in the middle/left of the Fern Grotto area. About 50' right of Leave The Eave.

content.description:
Wandering variation to the climbs on this face that follows the line with best pro.

Start in the right leaning crack to the left of the seam on the face. Climb this crack to the horizontal and traverse left. Make a few slabby face moves and clip the bolt shared by Sandals and Black Phantom.
content.protection: Thin hands/fingers for the initial crack, micro cams for the face, 1 bolt
content.location: Far left side of the Fern Grotto area, and about 50' right of the Strawberry Wall.

content.description: Boulder up on good holds to clip the first bolt. Tiny edges lead onto the face and the second bolt. Above the second bolt gear can be found in the right leaning crack. Make a few smeary 5.9 moves to the anchors. Overall pretty sustained at the given grade.
content.location: Middle of the Fern Grotto area, look for a blocky overhang down low.

content.description:
Easy climbing to a small ledge, then step right below a bolt. Continue trending right on nice edges and sidepulls, passing mixed gear and another bolt on the way to the anchors.

The gear is sparse before the first bolt, take care.
content.protection: Gear to 1", 2 bolts, cold shut anchors.
content.location: Just left of the toe of the main Fern Grotto buttress.

content.description:
Burly crux right off the ground, to a relatively cruiser corner, to another crux pulling left around a bulge. Kind of dirty but cool climbing, I'd give it three stars with more traffic and cleaning.

The gear is a bit tricky throughout, hence the PG13 - might want to TR it first if this is at your lead limit. Listed as "5.10" in the Horniak guide, it also might be a bit of a sandbag.
content.protection: 1 bolt, gear to 3", cold shut anchors.
content.location: Left side of the Fern Grotto area, on the right side of the Black Phantom block. Look for a large left-facing corner.

content.description: Nicely-featured slab linking diagonal seams. Another shortie for the area.
content.location: Middle-left of the Fern Grotto area, to the right of the obvious corner of Weekend At Fernies.

content.description:
I don't know if I would call this "classic", but it's pretty good. Follow a corner, with the crux passing a small bulge as you move left. Past the bulge, continue trending left to the anchors of "Maiden Voyage".

Cleaning this thing is kind of a pain in the ass due to the anchor placement, and you'll need some cord/webbing if you plan on top-roping it.
content.protection: Gear to 3", cold shuts anchors. Cord/webbing if topr-roping.
content.location: Obvious corner crack system, just right of the toe of the main Fern Grotto buttress.
